description:
In The Dog Listener Jan Fennell shares her revolutionary insight into the canine world and its instinctive language that has enabled her to bring even the most delinquent of dogs to heel. This easy-to-follow guide draws on Jan's countless case histories of problem dogsÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½from biters and barkers to bicycle chasersÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½to show how you can bridge the language barrier that separates you from your dog.

This edition includes a new 30-Day Training Guide to further incorporate Jan's powerful method into every element of pet ownership, including:

* Understanding what it means to care for a dog
* Choosing the right dog for you
* Introducing your dog to its new home
* Overcoming separation anxiety
* Walking on a leash
* Dealing with behavioral problems
* Grooming
* And much more

The Dog Listener: Learn How to Communicate with Your Dog for Willing Cooperation
